alert.note: Alert for Orange; Putnam (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 4:02PM EST until January 17 at 6:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SUNDAY TO 6 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Western Passaic County. In New York, Orange and Putnam Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM Sunday to 6 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
